headline: Is Mondelez International, Inc. (MDLZ) the Best FMCG Stock to Buy According to Billionaires?
summary: We recently published a list of 12 Best FMCG Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) stands against other best FMCG stocks to buy according to billionaires. Historically, the consumer-packaged-goods (CPG) industry outperformed most of the other industries, mainly due to […]
